EMAIL_VALID_MESSAGE: Please enter a valid email address.
MOBILE_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: Please enter a mobile number, including country code e.g. +27.
FEE_PLACEHOLDER: Fee you are willing to pay
ACCOUNT_HOLDER_PLACEHOLDER: What is the account holder's name?
BRANCH_CODE_PLACEHOLDER: What is your bank's branch code?
SWIFT_CODE_PLACEHOLDER: What is your bank's SWIFT code?
IBAN_PLACEHOLDER: What is your bank's IBAN number?
BIC_PLACEHOLDER: What is your bank's BIC code?
TRANSACTIONS_TEXT: Please verify your email address to redeem any unclaimed transactions. Pull to refresh your balance.
SEND_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: You are sending {{ currency }} {{ amount }} to {{to.length > 20 ? to.slice(0, 10) + '...' + to.slice(to.length - 5, to.length) : to }}.
SEND_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: You have sent {{ currency }} {{ amount }} to {{to.length > 20 ? to.slice(0, 10) + '...' + to.slice(to.length - 5, to.length) : to }}.
REQUEST_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: You are requesting {{ amount }} from {{ from }}.
REQUEST_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: You have requested {{ amount }} from {{ from }}.
DEPOSIT_INSTRUCTIONS: Fund your account by transferring {{ currency_code }} to the unique reference number below.
DEPOSIT_NO_INSTRUCTIONS: No deposit instructions have been provided.
WITHDRAW_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: You are about to withdraw {{ currency }} {{ amount }}.
WITHDRAW_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: You have successfully made a withdrawal of {{ currency }}{{ amount }}.
TELLER_OFFER_TRANSACTION: Earn {{ currency }} {{ fee }} for {{ currency }} {{ amount }} {{ tx_type }}.
MATCHED_OFFERS_DESCRIPTION: List of customers that have accepted your offer and will arrive soon.
NO_MATCHED_OFFERS_DESCRIPTION: You currently have no matched offers. Pull to refresh.
PENDING_OFFERS_DESCRIPTION: You are waiting for users to accept your offer. If a user accepts your offer, you will be matched.
NO_PENDING_OFFERS_DESCRIPTION: You currently have no pending offers. Pull to refresh.
SEARCH_DESCRIPTION: You want to {{ tx_type }} {{ currency }} {{ amount }} for {{ from_currency }} {{ from_amount }}. Cancel this transaction if you want to change your request.
RATE_TELLER_INSTRUCTIONS: Please rate the teller and the service they provided.
USER_CODE_INSTRUCTIONS: Please present this code in-person to the teller to complete your deposit.
TELLER_CODE_INSTRUCTIONS: {{ first_name }} will provide you with a code. Enter the code below in order to complete this transaction.
SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION: Pay {{ currency }} {{ total }} for a {{ currency }} {{ amount }} {{ tx_type }}.
INVALID_OFFER: The offer is no longer valid.
LOCATION_NOTE: How can the customer find you?
LOCATION_NOTE_PLACEHOLDER: Please provide basic instructions how to find you, e.g. what are you wearing or where you will be sitting.
LOCATION_NOTE_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: Please provide instructions for the customer.
TELLER_TRANSACTION: You've exchanged {{ currency }} {{ fee }} for {{ currency }} {{ amount }} {{ tx_type }}.
NO_REQUEST_NEARBY_DESCRIPTION: There are currently no transaction requests in your area. Pull to refresh.
DEPOSIT_TELLER_TRANSACTION: You've exchanged {{ currency }} {{ amount }} for {{ from_currency }} {{ from_amount }}
WITHDRAW_TELLER_TRANSACTION: You've exchanged {{ to_currency }} {{ to_amount }} for {{ currency }} {{ amount }}
DEPOSIT_TELLER_OFFER_TRANSACTION: Exchange {{ currency }} {{ amount }} for {{ from_currency }} {{ from_amount }}
WITHDRAW_TELLER_OFFER_TRANSACTION: Exchange {{ to_currency }} {{ to_amount }} for {{ currency }} {{ amount }}
DEPOSIT_SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION: Exchange {{ from_currency }} {{ from_amount }} for {{ currency }} {{ amount }}
WITHDRAW_SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION: Exchange {{ currency }} {{ amount }} for {{ to_currency }} {{ to_amount }}
RECEIVE_INSTRUCTIONS: The QR code is your public address for accepting payments.
PROMOTION_CODE_REDEEMED_MESSAGE: Congratulations, your promotion has been applied.
TWO_FACTOR_INSTRUCTIONS: You can manage two factor settings at https://www.rehive.com.
ID_DOCUMENT_INSTRUCTIONS: Instructions of why and how to upload a picture of ID document.
ID_SELFIE_INSTRUCTIONS: Instructions of why and how to take an ID Selfie.
PROOF_OF_ADDRESS_INSTRUCTIONS: Instructions of why and how to upload a proof of address.
UPLOAD_ERROR: There was an error uploading the file.
RENDER_ERROR: There was an error rendering the file.
NO_OFFERS_ERROR: No nearby teller offers were found, please try again later.
VERIFICATION_SENT: A verification email has been sent, please check your email inbox.
BUY_AMOUNT: How many lumens would you like to buy?
SELL_AMOUNT: How many lumens would you like to sell?
